dist.hmm

Class ModularHiddenMarkovModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.ModularHiddenMarkovModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiddenMarkovModel, java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleHiddenMarkovModel, SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess

    public class ModularHiddenMarkovModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements HiddenMarkovModel, Copyable
    The abstract base class representing a hidden markov model
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
